How To Use

To start using the application you need to setup some setting for your account. Please follow this instructions:

  1. Create the GamerSimplify Account.

  2. Login to the GamerSimplify using the registered Account.

  3. Open user setting.

  4. Under the “Link Platform”, link the available platform using your account on that platform.

Note

The project is still in the development, therefore the installation guide is not finished yet.
